name: Blood for Blood
description: Rend an enemy, dealing 2323 Magic Damage.  Deals up to 75% more damage based on your missing Health.  After you cast this ability, you cannot be healed by allies for 3 seconds.
effectLines: Costs Health to cast, but greatly increases the execute scaling.  After casting the ability, you cannot be healed by allies for a short duration.
coefDescription: Rend an enemy, dealing $1 Magic Damage.  Deals up to 75% more damage based on your missing Health.  After you cast this ability, you cannot be healed by allies for 3 seconds.
